examples.korean: The view from the window was uninspiring. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 창문에서 보는 광경은 시시했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The view from the window was uninspiring. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He quickly sketched the view from the window. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 창문에서 보이는 그 광경을 재빨리 스케치했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: The beauty of the scene defies description. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 광경의 아름다움은 필설로는 도저히 표현할 수가 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The beauty of the scene defies description. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They were stunned by the view from the summit. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 정상에서 본 그 광경에 큰 감동을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were stunned by the view from the summit. Add to Wordbook
